message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and benefits, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a significant saving while ensuring you receive unparalleled quality and service. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the discount, I'm looking to get a price closer to $800,000.  I believe this is still a fair price given the value of the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I understand your perspective and am willing to negotiate further. To bring our discussion closer to your expectations, I propose a revised price of $850,000 for the product. This still reflects the high value and quality of the item, while providing a more favorable deal for you. Please let me know if this proposal aligns better with your budget and preferences.
